Title: To Friend a Predator
Writer: Anders Holm, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dave King (staff writer), Brian Keith Etheridge
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Krystal Alvarez
Plot: A local child molester attracts the guys' attention, but not, as it turns out, for the reason they expected.
